recipesJson.name: Bird Cage (Strawberry, Cheesecake, Frosted Cereal)
recipesJson.author: oddDrop
recipesJson.description:
Bird Cage: (Strawberry, Cheesecake, Frosted Cereal)
"There was a dream, someday i could see it. Like a bird in a cage, i know i could free it"
Mix at Max VG No Added Sweetener.
This is a personal mix im working on but i felt like sharing the development process so all percentages and flavors are subject to change until its complete. Trying to achieve a very creamy dense yet delicate and complex cheesecake where the notes blend in perfectly. Getting extremely closer...

reviews.text:
Very nice. Very creamy on top of what you'd expect from the ingredients. I'm not getting much of the cheesecake though. 
It's a particularly well layered recipe.
